name: feed the world
description:
Description:

feed the world is a management, idle clicker game where you monopolize the food industry and conquer world hunger. Invest your hard earned money into farms to increase your profits. The game ends when you feed the world (around 7,600,000,000 people!). How fast can you do it?

Music: https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music

Controls:

- In the Main Menu, press the Arrow Keys up and down to toggle options. Press “Space” to either start or quit the game respectively.

- Click the icons with the mouse to collect or buy the respective item. 

- Press “Escape” to quit any anytime or press the “quit” button during the game.
